text: والو استقموا۟ على الطريقة لاسقينهم ماء غدقا

translations.translation: If only they were to go straight on the Path, We would give them abundant water to drink
(Say): "If they keep to the right path We shall give them water in abundance to drink
If people were to keep firmly to the Right Way, We would have vouchsafed them abundant rain
Had they (jinn and mankind) remained steadfast in their religion (Islam), We would certainly have given them abundant water to drink

And proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I have received the divine revelation that ‘Had they remained upright on the straight path, We would have given them abundant water.’
If they had believed in Allah, and went on the way, We would surely have bestowed on them water in abundance.
And that if they should keep to the (right) way, We would certainly give them to drink of abundant water,
Would they but go straight on the way, We would give them to drink of water copious,
If they (the idolaters) tread the right path, We shall give them to drink of water in abundance
If they had followed the right path, We would have provided them with abundant rain --
And had they kept to the path surely We would have watered them with rain plenteous.
If they are steadfast on the path [of Allah], We shall provide them with abundant water,
(And Allah's Message is): "If they (the Pagans) had (only) remained on the (right) Way, We should certainly have bestowed on them Rain in abundance.
If they (non-Muslims) had believed in Allah, and went on the Right Way (i.e. Islam) We should surely have bestowed on them water (rain) in abundance.
If they had followed the Path We would give to them abundant water to drink,
Had they kept true to the Path, We would have given them plenty water to drink.
And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

[72:16] God, exalted be He, says [the following] about the Meccan disbelievers: And [it has been revealed to me] that if they (allaw: softened in place of the hardened form, its subject having been omitted, that is to say, annahum [law], which is a supplement to annahu istama‘a, ‘that [a company of jinn] listened’) adopt the [right] path, the path of submission [to God], We will give them abundant water to drink, plenteous [water], from the heaven — this was after rain had been withheld from them for seven years —

If they (the idolaters) tread the right path) the path of disbelief; and it is said: the path of Islam, (We shall give them to drink of water in abundance) We shall give them abundant wealth and a comfortable life

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَامُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ } معناه عَلَى الإِسلامِ
 { لأَسْقَيْنَاهُم مَّآءً غَدَقاً } معناه كثيرٌ
 واسقَيناهُم: معناه جَعلنَاهُم سُقياً
 ويقال الماء الغَدقُ: هو المَالُ، معناه لو آمنوا لوسَّعنا عَلَيهم في الرِّزقِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ قال سبحانه: { وَأَلَّوِ } أي: وأن الشأن والأمر أنه؛ أي: الجن والإنس المجبولين على فطرة التكليف { ٱسْتَقَامُواْ } واعتدلوا { عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ } أي: جادة المعرفة والتوحيد { لأَسْقَيْنَاهُم } تلطفاً لهم، وترحماً عليهم { مَّآءً } محيياً لأراضي أجسامهم الميتة بسموم الإمكان، وبحموم الأماني الصاعدة من نيران الطبيعة { غَدَقاً } [الجن: 16] كثيراً إلى حيث يجعل لهم روضة من رياض الجنان

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { وأن لو استقاموا } أي: القاسطون { على الطريقة } طريقة الإسلام { لأسْقيناهم } المطر { ماءً غَدَقاً } أي: كثيراً، والمعنى: لوسّعنا عليهم الرزق
